mapper.select: SELECT A .ORDERSCODE AS ORDERSCODE, a.TBDWNAME as TBDWNAME, A .TBLXR AS TBLXR, A .PAYMENTAMOUNT AS PAYMENTAMOUNT, A .MOBILE AS MOBILE, A .REMARKS AS REMARKS, A .FKFS AS FKFS FROM T_ORDERS A WHERE A .TBDWNAME = #{tbdwname}
